remarks: The multiplicative group of the power structure resembles the power of the multiplicative group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)
statement:
pwsmgp.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsmgp.m $e |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
pwsmgp.z $e |- Z = ( M ^s I ) $.
pwsmgp.n $e |- N = ( mulGrp ` Y ) $.
pwsmgp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` N ) $.
pwsmgp.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Z ) $.
pwsmgp.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` N ) $.
pwsmgp.q $e |- .+b = ( +g ` Z ) $.
pwsmgp $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( B = C /\ .+ = .+b ) ) $.
